Title: The Night Shift
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Matt Murray, Phil Augusta Jackson (executive story editor), Tricia McAlpin (executive story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (executive story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake, on his first case back at the precinct, commandeers the vehicle of Jess Day, (from New Girl) who's visiting New York. In the meantime, Holt tries to increase office morale and Amy wants to know why Rosa is taking such long breaks.
